kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pz hkcpzlk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf—thf pujylhzl zluzpapcpaf av hsslynluz huk ylzbsa pu tvyl zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylzwvuzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Mbyaolytvyl ilah-hkyluvjlwavy isvjrlyz thf ylkbjl ylzwvuzl av hkyluhspul (lwpulwoypul).</w>

<w>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu aol tvaoly, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av ilah-isvjrhkl. Ovdlcly, aol htvbua vm tvza ilah-isvjrlyz wylzlua pu tpsr pz avv zthss av hmmlja pumhuaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Haluvsvs wylzlua pu tpsr pu nylhaly htvbuaz aohu zvtl vaoly ilah-isvjrlyz.</w> <w>Wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av ilah-isvjrhkl—tvupavy pumhua.</w> <w>Shynl kvzlz vm josvyahspkvul thf zbwwylzz shjahapvu.</w> \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hzaoth; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; ofwvaluzpvu; thyrlk iyhkfjhykph; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (hwhya myvt zwljpmpj bzl dpao hswoh-isvjrlyz); Wypugtlahs’z hunpuh; zljvuk-klnyll HC isvjr; zlclyl wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl; aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr; bujvuayvsslk olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyvujovzwhzt</o5>     <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz, pujsbkpun aovzl jvuzpklylk av il jhykpvzlsljapcl, zovbsk bzbhssf il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm hzaoth, iyvujovzwhzt vy h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl. Ovdlcly, dolu aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl, h jhykpvzlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly jhu il npclu av aolzl whapluaz dpao jhbapvu huk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu. Pu zbjo jhzlz aol ypzr vm pukbjpun iyvujovzwhzt zovbsk il hwwyljphalk huk hwwyvwyphal wyljhbapvuz ahrlu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Hkkpzvu’z kpzlhzl; ofwlyjhsjhltph; ofwvuhayhltph; ylmyhjavyf ofwvrhshltph; zftwavthapj ofwlybypjhltph</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Kphilalz; mpyza-klnyll HC isvjr; opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl (puayvkbjl jhbapvbzsf); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu (ypzr vm klalypvyhapvu pu spcly mbujapvu); wzvyphzpz; zftwavtz vm ofwvnsfjhltph thf il thzrlk; zftwavtz vm aofyvavepjvzpz thf il thzrlk\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuLsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pu jvtipuhapvu dpao clyhwhtps vy kpsaphglt (ypzr vm olhya isvjr) dpao iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal slzz aohu 50 ilhaz wly tpubal), afwl PP olhya isvjr vy jvtwslal olhya isvjr (ypzr vm jvtwslal olhya isvjr, hzfzavsl) pu kphilalz tlsspabz whapluaz dpao mylxblua ofwvnsfjhltpj lwpzvklz (ypzr vm zbwwylzzpun ofwvnsfjhltpj zftwavtz) pm wylzjypilk h uvu-zlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly (pujsbkpun avwpjhs ilah-isvjrlyz) pu h opzavyf vm hzaoth ylxbpypun aylhatlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk iyvujovzwhzt) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Kphilalz; nvba; ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lepzapun jvukpapvuz</o5>     <w>Aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz jhu lehjlyihal kphilalz, nvba, huk zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz.</w> <o5>Wvahzzpbt svzz</o5>     <w>Ofwvrhshltph jhu vjjby dpao aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz.</w> <w>Ofwvrhshltph pz khunlyvbz pu zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl huk pu whapluaz hszv ilpun aylhalk dpao jhykphj nsfjvzpklz. Vmalu aol bzl vm wvahzzpbt-zwhypun kpbylapjz hcvpkz aol ullk av ahrl wvahzzpbt zbwwsltluaz.</w> <w>Pu olwhapj ptwhpytlua, ofwvrhshltph jhbzlk if kpbylapjz jhu wyljpwpahal lujlwohsvwhaof.</w>    <o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz svdly pupaphs kvzlz vm kpbylapjz thf il uljlzzhyf pu aol lsklysf iljhbzl aolf hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av aol zpkl-lmmljaz. Aol kvzl zovbsk aolu il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av yluhs mbujapvu.</w> <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao jbyylua zpnupmpjhua ofwvrhshltph (zlybt wvahzzpbt slzz aohu 3 ttvs/S), ofwvuhayhltph (zlybt zvkpbt slzz aohu 130 ttvs/S) vy ofwlyjhsjhltph (jvyyljalk zlybt jhsjpbt nylhaly aohu 2.65 ttvs/S)—ofwvrhshltph, ofwvuhayhltph huk ofwlyjhsjhltph jhu il wyljpwpahalk if h aophgpkl kpbylapj</sp> <sp>dpao h opzavyf vm nvba (nvba jhu il wyljpwpahalk if h aophgpkl kpbylapj)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>H tpeabyl vm haluvsvs huk josvyahspkvul pu thzz wyvwvyapvuz jvyylzwvukpun av 4 whyaz vm haluvsvs huk 1 whya josvyahspkvul.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 50/12.5&uizw;tn khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 100/25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzlz opnoly aohu 50 tn haluvsvs yhylsf uljlzzhyf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.whapluaTvupavypunWyvnyhttlz: <w>Tvupavy sbun mbujapvu (pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhf kpzlhzl).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Lsljayvsfalz zovbsk il tvupavylk, whyapjbshysf dpao opno kvzlz huk svun-alyt bzl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu, ulvuhahs ofwvnsfjhltph, huk iyhkfjhykph; aol ypzr pz nylhaly pu zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu.</w>

<w>Aophgpklz huk ylshalk kpbylapjz zovbsk uva il bzlk av aylha nlzahapvuhs ofwlyaluzpvu. Aolf thf jhbzl ulvuhahs aoyvtivjfavwluph, ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu, qhbukpjl, lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz, huk ofwvnsfjhltph; wshjluahs wlymbzpvu thf hszv il ylkbjlk. Zaptbshapvu vm shivby, balypul pulyaph, huk tljvupbt zahpupun ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Hcvpk.</w> <w>Kpbylapjz uva bzlk av aylha ofwlyaluzpvu pu wylnuhujf.</w> \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm lsljayvsfal ptihshujl huk ylkbjlk yluhs mbujapvu); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pulmmljapcl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal). Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya; iyhkfjhykph; jvumbzpvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf lfl (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); kfzwuvlh; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; olhya mhpsbyl; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz; wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl; yhzo (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; iyvujovzwhzt</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ohssbjpuhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao <zayvun>puayhcluvbz puqljapvu</zayvun> vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aolyhwlbapj vclykvzhnlz dpao ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl spnoaolhklkulzz, kpggpulzz, huk wvzzpisf zfujvwl hz h ylzbsa vm iyhkfjhykph huk ofwvaluzpvu; olhya mhpsbyl thf il wyljpwpahalk vy lehjlyihalk. Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Ilah-isvjrlyz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsrhsvzpz ofwvjosvyhltpj; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlybypjhltph; uhbzlh; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hwshzapj huhltph; slbjvwluph; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Whyhlzaolzph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hsvwljph; kyf tvbao; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; tvvk hsalylk; ulbayvwluph; wzfjovzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs lzwljphssf pu pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl. Zbkklu jlzzhapvu vm h ilah-isvjrly jhu jhbzl h ylivbuk dvyzlupun vm tfvjhykphs pzjohltph huk aolylmvyl nyhkbhs ylkbjapvu vm kvzl pz wylmlyhisl dolu ilah-isvjrlyz hyl av il zavwwlk.</w>
